Author: tf2manu994
Text: You can budget it for a few days.   That was really sweet of him. You could talk to him if you trust him. You could eat at work instead of home. You could chew gum to prevent your stomach from grumbling. You could come up with an excuse, and thank him anyway.   Regardless, you do deserve to eat. And an extra 1000 one day won't do too much. I know it doesn't feel like it. But it's worth considering it you won't mentally process it as a binge.
